Message Length.description: Controls the typical length of messages

very_short.description: Very brief, concise messages with minimal elaboration

short.description: Brief messages that get to the point quickly

medium.description: Balanced messages with some detail but not overly verbose

long.description: Detailed messages that elaborate on thoughts and feelings

very_long.description: Highly detailed messages with extensive elaboration

Formality.description: Controls how formal or casual the language is

variations.very_casual: Uses slang, abbreviations, emojis, and very informal language
variations.casual: Relaxed language with some informal elements
variations.neutral: Balanced language that is neither overly formal nor casual
variations.formal: Professional language with proper grammar and vocabulary

Expressiveness.description: Controls how emotionally expressive the language is

variations.reserved: Subtle emotional cues with restrained expression
variations.expressive: Strong emotional language with clear feelings

Text Patterns.description: Special text patterns that characterize the writing style

variations.punctuation_light: minimal punctuation often missing periods or commas
variations.capitalization_inconsistent: Sometimes Uses Capitals For Emphasis or doesn't capitalize at all
variations.abbreviation_heavy: uses lots of abbrev. & acronyms w/o explanation
variations.typo_prone: occassional typos and misspellings that look natural
variations.standard: follows conventional writing patterns with normal punctuation and capitalization
